scripts.build-dist-lite: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true scss/lite.scss dist/lite.minimalist.css && node-sass --source-map true --output-style compressed scss/lite.scss dist/lite.minimalist.min.css
scripts.build-dist: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true scss/minimalist.scss dist/minimalist.css && node-sass --source-map true --output-style compressed scss/minimalist.scss dist/minimalist.min.css
scripts.build: npm run build-dist && npm run build-dist-lite
